textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 04/27/2011 There is concern about the potential for a chemical spill in the Ohio River after several barges broke loose and struck a local bridge Wednesday morning. 4 Barges Break Free, Hit Bridge Near Neville Island 04/28/2011 A local bridge that was hit by runaway barges on Wednesday is reopened after hours of inspection. Towboat Captain Praised After Retrieving Barge 06/24/2015 Officials are working to identify a man’s body that was found on a Neville Island riverbank Wednesday morning. M.E. Working To Identify Body Found In Ohio River Near Neville Island
